queries.query: select count(distinct e.patient_hid) as value from encounter e join patient p on e.patient_hid = p.patient_hid where facility_id=':paramFacilityId:' and TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, date(p.dob), date(e.encounter_datetime)) between 0 and 4 and p.gender='F' and LOWER(e.visit_type)='outpatient' and DATE_FORMAT(e.encounter_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d')=':paramStartDate:';

select count(distinct e.patient_hid) as value from encounter e join patient p on e.patient_hid = p.patient_hid where facility_id=':paramFacilityId:' and TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, date(p.dob), date(e.encounter_datetime)) between 15 and 24 and p.gender='M' and LOWER(e.visit_type)='outpatient' and DATE_FORMAT(e.encounter_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d')=':paramStartDate:';

select count(distinct e.patient_hid) as value from encounter e join patient p on e.patient_hid = p.patient_hid where facility_id=':paramFacilityId:' and TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, date(p.dob), date(e.encounter_datetime)) between 15 and 24 and p.gender='F' and LOWER(e.visit_type)='outpatient' and DATE_FORMAT(e.encounter_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d')=':paramStartDate:';

select count(distinct e.patient_hid) as value from encounter e join patient p on e.patient_hid = p.patient_hid where facility_id=':paramFacilityId:' and TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, date(p.dob), date(e.encounter_datetime)) between 25 and 49 and p.gender='F' and LOWER(e.visit_type)='outpatient' and DATE_FORMAT(e.encounter_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d')=':paramStartDate:';

select count(distinct e.patient_hid) as value from encounter e join patient p on e.patient_hid = p.patient_hid where facility_id=':paramFacilityId:' and TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, date(p.dob), date(e.encounter_datetime)) between 5 and 14 and p.gender='F' and LOWER(e.visit_type)='outpatient' and DATE_FORMAT(e.encounter_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d')=':paramStartDate:';

select count(distinct e.patient_hid) as value from encounter e join patient p on e.patient_hid = p.patient_hid where facility_id=':paramFacilityId:' and TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, date(p.dob), date(e.encounter_datetime)) between 50 and 200 and p.gender='M' and LOWER(e.visit_type)='outpatient' and DATE_FORMAT(e.encounter_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d')=':paramStartDate:';

select count(distinct pdd.patient_hid) as value from (patient_death_details pdd join patient p on p.patient_hid = pdd.patient_hid) join encounter e on pdd.encounter_id = e.encounter_id where  TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, date(p.dob), date(pdd.date_of_death)) <= 4 and p.gender = 'F' and DATE_FORMAT(pdd.date_of_death, '%Y-%m-%d')=':paramStartDate:' and e.facility_id = ':paramFacilityId:';

select count(distinct pdd.patient_hid) as value from (patient_death_details pdd join patient p on p.patient_hid = pdd.patient_hid) join encounter e on pdd.encounter_id = e.encounter_id where TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, date(p.dob), date(pdd.date_of_death)) between 15 and 24 and p.gender = 'M' and DATE_FORMAT(pdd.date_of_death, '%Y-%m-%d')=':paramStartDate:' and e.facility_id = ':paramFacilityId:';
